title: ICE: index out of bounds: 0, compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/sty.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code ```Rust trait Foo: { fn bar() -> ((), ); } impl Foo<> () { fn bar( s: _) -> _ {} } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (171693274 2023-03-14) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1716932743a7b3705cbf0c34db0c4e070ed1930d commit-date: 2023-03-14 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
